title: Is Bacon Overrated?
description:
Bacon has made its way onto every section of the menu and bacon buffs are zealous in proclaiming that it makes everything better-- but are these truly innovative flavors, or simply a fatty familiar tune? Today, we explore: is bacon overrated?
